casebody.data:
Logan LOTT, Kirsten Lott, and the Royal Bakery, LLC
v.
PLAQUEMINES PARISH GOVERNMENT; Nova Casualty Insurance Company; ABC Insurance Company ; Amos Cormier, III; Edward Theriot; Stanley Wallace; Robert Barnett; DEF Insurance Company; John Barthelemy; Irvin Juneau; Benedict Rousselle; Charlie Burt ; Audrey Trufant-Salvant; and Nicole Smith Williams NO. 2018-CC-2094 Supreme Court of Louisiana. February 18, 2019

Denied.
